interfaceOptions.toolTip: Edit the Bounding Box by closing this modal and using the map tool.
Edit the Date Range by closing this modal and modifying the when input of your search.

Edit Stations by closing this modal and deselecting the file.
Note: Each file contains one station.
Data Types are the elements representing environmental observations in NCEI's data.
Select 'Yes' or 'No' for data attributes to be included in your order (CSV only).
Select 'Yes' or 'No' for latitude/longitude coordinates to appear in your file. (CSV only)
Select 'Yes' or 'No' for a station name to appear in your file. (CSV only).

Units of measure are either
'Standard (US) or Metric'.
